channel.title: Pastebin Issues/warnings
channel.description:
The pastebin has been cleansed of spam :)
sppt finally pulled it off and gave me a nice admin interface on the pastebin where I can delete pastes, then I used my less-than-stellar php abilities and gave myself the ability to view ips of the pasters and get thier real username from the forums, and also the ability to ip ban people from pasteing code, I will use it, you have been warned ;) :D

item.title: Pastebin Issues/warnings
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

k, just trying to make sure this community can't get shot down , especially since Fawki left.

Read full topic

item.title: Pastebin Issues/warnings
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

KyleGut3:

wait.. i thought the point of the pastebin was for any possible copyright infringement code, and that we posted it there because you had no control over it? could your new power over the pastebin ruin this?

the only reason copyrighted code is posted there is because it is not on the same server as the forums are, that is it

Read full topic

item.title: Pastebin Issues/warnings
item.dc:creator: @SuperNewb SuperNewb
item.description:
@SuperNewb wrote:

but mopar needed to control the stuff in the pastbin to stop spammers from annoying us

Read full topic
